attributes.visState: {"title":"gerrit_newcomers_barchart_contributions_organization_recent_previous","type":"horizontal_bar","params":{"type":"histogram","grid":{"categoryLines":false,"style":{"color":"#eee"}},"categoryAxes":[{"id":"CategoryAxis-1","type":"category","position":"left","show":true,"style":{},"scale":{"type":"linear"},"labels":{"show":true,"rotate":0,"filter":false,"truncate":200},"title":{}}],"valueAxes":[{"id":"ValueAxis-1","name":"LeftAxis-1","type":"value","position":"bottom","show":true,"style":{},"scale":{"type":"linear","mode":"normal"},"labels":{"show":true,"rotate":75,"filter":true,"truncate":100},"title":{"text":"Number of contributions"}}],"seriesParams":[{"show":true,"type":"histogram","mode":"normal","data":{"label":"Number of contributions","id":"1"},"valueAxis":"ValueAxis-1","drawLinesBetweenPoints":true,"showCircles":true}],"addTooltip":true,"addLegend":true,"legendPosition":"right","times":[],"addTimeMarker":false,"orderBucketsBySum":false},"aggs":[{"id":"1","enabled":true,"type":"count","schema":"metric","params":{"customLabel":"Number of contributions"}},{"id":"2","enabled":true,"type":"terms","schema":"segment","params":{"field":"author_org_name","size":3,"order":"desc","orderBy":"1","otherBucket":true,"otherBucketLabel":"Other","missingBucket":true,"missingBucketLabel":"Missing","customLabel":"Organization"}},{"id":"3","enabled":true,"type":"filters","schema":"group","params":{"filters":[{"input":{"query":"grimoire_creation_date:>now-90d","language":"lucene"},"label":"Recent contributions (last 90 days)"},{"input":{"query":"grimoire_creation_date:<=now-90d","language":"lucene"},"label":"Previous contributions (before last 90 days)"}]}}]}

attributes.title: gerrit_newcomers_markdown_definition_newcomer
attributes.visState:
{"title":"gerrit_newcomers_markdown_definition_newcomer","type":"markdown","params":{"fontSize":12,"openLinksInNewTab":false,"markdown":"## What's a newcomer?

We consider as **newcomer** every Gerrit user whose **first patchset** was made within a date range defined by a certain date and the current date.

The period of time for considering users as **newcomers** is defined with the *time-picker* (top-right corner). 
This means the dashboard will show the activity from people whose first patchset was made during the selected date range.

### Important:
The **end date** from the selected date range must be the **current date** (`Now`)."},"aggs":[]}

attributes.title: gerrit_newcomers_markdown_leaving
attributes.visState:
{"title":"gerrit_newcomers_markdown_leaving","type":"markdown","params":{"fontSize":12,"openLinksInNewTab":false,"markdown":"## How we consider a newcomer is leaving?

We can say a **newcomer** is leaving when its last contribution was made before a defined time period, taking the current date as the end of this range.

By default, we are taking **90 days** as threshold, which means:
* Any newcomer whose last contribution was more than 90 days ago will be considered as a **leaving** newcomer. 
* Otherwise, it will be an **active** newcomer."},"aggs":[]}

attributes.title: gerrit_newcomers_markdown_date_fields
attributes.visState:
{"title":"gerrit_newcomers_markdown_date_fields","type":"markdown","params":{"fontSize":12,"openLinksInNewTab":false,"markdown":"## Which date fields are used?

* `patchset_min_date`: the date of the **first patchset** for a given Gerrit contributor. The **time-picker** filter is using this field to select the date range when contributors are considered as **newcomers**.

* `demography_max_date`: the date of the **last contribution** (of any type) for a given Gerrit contributor. If this date is greater than a given period of time (by default, 90 days), we can say if that contributor is **active** or is **leaving**.

* `grimoire_creation_date`: the date when the contribution was made on Gerrit. If this date is contained in the defined period of time (by default, 90 days), the contribution is marked as **Recent**. If it is older, it will be marked as **Previous** contribution."},"aggs":[]}

attributes.description: This dashboard shows information about Gerrit contributors (newcomers) and their activity.
